QuestData.Title: Escape from the Catacombs
QuestData.Description: These trolls ambushed me and have been keeping me in this cage. I think they're planning to sacrifice me! Help me get out of here!$B$BThe lock on the cage isn't that complex... I just can't get to it from this side. Please escort me back to the Farstrider Enclave. I'm sure Captain Helios will reward you, and you'll have my undying gratitude!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Ranger Lilatha back to the Farstrider Enclave
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Ranger Lilatha to Captain Helios at Farstrider Enclave in the Ghostlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Captain Helios at Farstrider Enclave in Ghostlands.
QuestData.RewardText: You're quite the hero, $c, to get her out of there alive. I suppose we'll have to mount an offensive to clear out those catacombs too. As if we didn't have enough trouble with the living trolls!$B$BYou've done a great thing today, I should reward you. Take your pick from any of these.
